org.daisy.pipeline.tts

Interface LoadBalancer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoundRobinLoadBalancer

    public interface LoadBalancer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  LoadBalancer.Host 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void discard(LoadBalancer.Host h)
      Discard the given host.
      Collection<LoadBalancer.Host> getAllHosts()
      Must not be called from different threads.
      LoadBalancer.Host getMaster()
      Can be called from different threads.
      LoadBalancer.Host selectHost()
      Can be called from different threads.

    • Method Detail

      • selectHost

        LoadBalancer.Host selectHost()
        Can be called from different threads.
        Returns:
        the next host chosen according to the load balancer's strategy.

      • getAllHosts

        Collection<LoadBalancer.Host> getAllHosts()
        Must not be called from different threads.
        Returns:
        all the possible hosts that selectHost() can return. It may be used for checking that all the servers are up. It may not return the master host as long as it cannot be returned by selectHost().

      • getMaster

        LoadBalancer.Host getMaster()
        Can be called from different threads.
        Returns:
        the host that should be used for querying general information such as the available voices etc.

      • discard

        void discard(LoadBalancer.Host h)
        Discard the given host. After this call, selectHost() will no longer return @param h. Must not be called from different threads.
